requirements.name: UserAccountSecurity
requirements.description: Passwords for organizer and attendee accounts shall be stored securely and not transmitted in plain text.

requirements.name: EmailDeliveryReliability
requirements.description: Invitations shall be reliably delivered via email to all attendees.

requirements.name: InvitationResponseTracking
requirements.description: The system shall clearly indicate the RSVP status of all invitees to the organizer.

requirements.name: Task List Reusability
requirements.description: Tasks added to a checklist shall be reusable in future events of the same type.

requirements.name: TaskListVisibility
requirements.description: Attendee-assigned tasks shall only be visible to attendees who have confirmed participation

requirements.name: CreateEvent
requirements.description: The system shall allow organizers to create a new event by specifying event type, occasion, date/time, and location.

requirements.name: InviteAttendees
requirements.description: The system shall allow organizers to invite attendees by providing their names and email addresses.

requirements.name: RespondToInvitation
requirements.description: Attendees shall be able to confirm, tentatively confirm, or decline an event invitation.

requirements.name: ManageEventTasks
requirements.description: Organizers shall be able to manage tasks: mark as done, add new tasks, or assign tasks to attendees.

requirements.name: ClaimAttendeeTasks
requirements.description: Attendees shall be able to select tasks assigned for attendees once they confirm attendance.
